definitions.definition: Marijuana that has been chopped to prepare it for smoking.
A stew of meat, broth, milk, butter, vegetables, and seasonings, thickened with soda crackers.
The gauze used in bookbinding to adhere a text block to a book's cover.
An inferior kind of madder prepared from the smaller roots or the peelings and refuse of the larger.
(usually with over) To work (over) mentally; to cogitate; to ruminate.
definitions.example: he paused to mull over his various options before making a decision

definitions.definition: To chop marijuana so that it becomes a smokable form.
To heat and spice something, such as wine.
To join two or more individual windows at mullions.
A snuffbox made of the small end of a horn.
